hero.subtitle: Amaranto Law Firm offers legal consultation and assistance in civil and criminal law.

areas.title: Practice Areas
areas.subtitle: Expertise and experience across different areas of law

civil.title: Civil Law
civil.description: Contracts, property, compensation, succession. Consultation for patrimonial and personal matters.

criminal.title: Criminal Law
criminal.description: Defense in criminal proceedings, common and military crimes. Complete legal assistance for the protection of your rights.

family.title: Family Law
family.description: Separations, divorces, cohabitation agreements, child protection and custody. Legal support in delicate moments of family life.

military.title: Condominium Law
military.description: Protection of condominium rights and management of condominium disputes. Legal assistance for property issues and regulations.

presentation.title: About us
presentation.subtitle: Experience and professionalism at your service
presentation.description: Amaranto Law Firm specializes in civil and family law. Active in rights protection, separations and mediation.
